pA~gktO# yaqj~jO dEqvatA$Scaiqva yaqj~ja~jcAva# rundhEgAyaqtrO vA aqgnirgA#yaqtra Ca#ndAqstaM Canda#sAq vya#rddhayatiq yat pa~jca#kapAlaM kaqrOtyaqShTAka#pAlaH kAqryO$&ShTAkSha#rA gAyaqtrI gA#yaqtrO$&gni-rgA#yaqtra Ca#ndAqH svEnaiqvainaqM Canda#sAq sama#rddhayati paq~gktyau# yAjyAnuvAqkyE# BavataqH pA~gktO# yaqj~jastEnaiqva yaqj~jAnnaiti# || 15 
(saqviqtaq-rdEqvA ya#j~jaqmuShaqH - sarvA# dEqvatAq - strica#tvAri(gm)Sacca) (A4)
